<voice 00449_00052304><start_lip_sync n02041 _normal m00001>受不了，大家都知道吧～！
就是让格斗场的怪物们战斗到只剩下最后一只，
真不愧是贝尔穆德陛下<heart><stop_lip_animation n02041 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52304.zh-Hant:
<voice 00449_00052304><start_lip_sync n02041 _normal m00001>受不了，大家都知道吧～！
就是讓格鬥場的怪物們戰鬥到剩下最後一隻為止，
真不愧是貝爾穆德陛下<heart><stop_lip_animation n02041 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52305.en:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>They're really gonna fight to the death...
Whew! I got chills just thinking about it!
This is gonna be the best event ever!<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52305.ja:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>「魔物どもが　ぶっ倒れるまで　戦い抜く……。
　クーッ！　考えただけで　ゾクゾクするぜ！
　こいつぁ　今までのショーなんか目じゃねえぞ！<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52305.ko:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>: 마물들이 죄다 쓰러질 때까지 싸운다니…….
　크으~! 생각만 해도 흥분되는데!
　지금까지 본 쇼와는 차원이 다르겠어!<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52305.zh-Hans:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>让怪物们不断战斗直至倒下……
唔！想想就觉得很兴奋！
之前的表演简直都不够看了！<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52305.zh-Hant:
<voice 00489_00052305><start_lip_sync n02040 _normal m00001>讓怪物們戰鬥到剩下最後一隻為止……
唔！光想像就讓人好興奮啊！
之前的表演簡直都不夠看了！<stop_lip_animation n02040 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52306.en: <voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Did you hear what they just said...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52306.ja:
<voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さん。
　今の話　聞いた？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52306.ko:
<voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨.
　방금 그 얘기 들었어?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52306.zh-Hans:
<voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……<pc>，
你听到他们刚才说的了吗？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52306.zh-Hant:
<voice 00549_00052306><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……<pc>，
你聽到他們剛才說的了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52307.en:
<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>How horrible!
Forcing monsters to fight to
the death like that!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52307.ja:
<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ひどすぎるよっ！
　死ぬまで　魔物たちを戦わせようだなんて！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52307.ko:
<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이건 너무해!
　마물들을 죽을 때까지 싸우게 하다니!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52307.zh-Hans:
<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>太过分了！
竟然要让怪物们决一死斗！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52307.zh-Hant:
<voice 00594_00052307><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>太過分了！
竟然要讓怪物們決一死鬥！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52308.en:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>We have to do something about this stupid
event and put a stop to it...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52308.ja:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「そんな　バカなイベント
　どうにかして　中止させなきゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52308.ko:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그런 말도 안 되는 이벤트는
　반드시 막아야 해…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52308.zh-Hans:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我得想办法
阻止这荒谬的活动才行……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52308.zh-Hant:
<voice 00634_00052308><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我得想辦法
阻止這荒謬的活動才行……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000823.en:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>That's it... I've got a good idea! <pc>,
with your help, we might be able to save the monsters!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000823.ja:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「そうだ……。　いいこと　思いついた！
　<pc>さんがいれば　魔物たちを
　助けてあげられるかもしれないわ！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000823.ko:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그래……. 좋은 생각이 났어!
　<pc> 씨가 있으면 마물들을
　구할 수 있을지도 몰라!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000823.zh-Hans:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>对了……我想到一个好办法了！
只要有<pc>，或许就可以
帮助怪物们！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000823.zh-Hant:
<voice 00704_29000823><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>對了……我想到一個好辦法了！
只要有<pc>，或許就可以
幫助怪物們！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52310.en:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Monsters in the arena are taken into the underground
cages via the service entrance on Arahaghiro's east
side.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52310.ja:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「格闘場の魔物って　アラハギーロの東側にある
　魔物専用の通用口を　通って
　地下のオリに　入れられてるの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52310.ko:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 격투장의 마물들은 아라하길로 동쪽에 있는
　마물 전용 출입구를 통해
　지하 우리로 들어가.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52310.zh-Hans:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>格斗场的怪物是从艾拉哈奇罗东侧的
怪物专用通道
运送到地下牢笼里。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52310.zh-Hant:
<voice 00744_00052310><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>格鬥場的怪物是從艾拉哈奇羅東側的
怪物專用通道
送到地下牢籠裡。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000537.en:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>For now, should we go to the side entrance? We can
talk about the details there.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000537.ja:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「とりあえず　その通用口まで　行こう？
　くわしい話は　そこでするから。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000537.ko:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 우선 그 출입구로 가자.
　자세한 이야기는 거기서 할 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000537.zh-Hans:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>总之先去那个通道吧。
详细的事情到那里再说。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000537.zh-Hant:
<voice 00774_29000537><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>總之先去那個後門吧。
詳細的事情到那裡再說。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000538.en:
<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You can't get to the monsters-only service
entrance from inside town.
Try outside, along the town's eastern wall.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000538.ja:
<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「町の中からは　魔物専用の通用口へ行けないよ。
　一度　外へ出て　城壁を東側に回ってみて。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000538.ko:
<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 마을 안에서는 마물 전용 출입구로 갈 수 없어.
　우선 밖으로 나가서 성벽 동쪽으로 우회해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000538.zh-Hans:
<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>城镇内是到不了怪物专用通道的。
先出城去，沿着城墙绕到东侧看看。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000538.zh-Hant:
<voice 00814_29000538><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>城鎮內是到不了怪物專用通道的喔。
先出城去，沿著城牆繞到東側看看。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000539.en:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>, please wait! I brought Clawde
along.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000539.ja:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん　ちょっと待って！
　チョメを　連れてくるから。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000539.ko:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 잠깐만 기다려!
　초메를 데리고 올게.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000539.zh-Hans:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>，等一下！
我要带乔麦过来。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000539.zh-Hant:
<voice 00100_29000539><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>，等一下！
我要帶喬麥過來。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000540.en:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Sorry to keep you waiting... Ok then, all good? I'll
explain my plan to save all the monsters captured in
the arena.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000540.ja:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「お待たせ……それじゃ　いーい？
　格闘場に捕まってる　魔物たちを助けるために
　私が考えた作戦を　説明するね。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000540.ko:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 기다렸지……? 그럼 준비됐어?
　격투장에 붙잡혀 있는 마물들을 구하기 위해
　내가 생각한 작전을 설명할게.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000540.zh-Hans:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>久等了……那么，可以了吗？
为了拯救被抓到格斗场的怪物们，
我要说明我想到的作战内容了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000540.zh-Hant:
<voice 00290_29000540><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>久等了……那麼，可以了嗎？
為了拯救被抓到格鬥場的怪物們，
我要說明我想到的作戰內容囉。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52315.en:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>At the end, there's stairs leading to the arena's
basement. Once there, go right and there are a bunch
of cells holding the monsters.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52315.ja:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「この先に　格闘場の地下へ降りる階段があるわ。
　その階段を降りて　すぐ右の部屋に
　魔物たちを入れるオリが　いくつもあるの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52315.ko:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이 앞에 격투장 지하로 내려가는 계단이 있는데
　그 계단을 내려가면 바로 오른쪽 방에
　마물들이 갇힌 우리가 여럿 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52315.zh-Hans:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>前方有通向格斗场地下的楼梯。
下了楼梯后右手边的房间
有几个关着怪物们的牢笼。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52315.zh-Hant:
<voice 00380_00052315><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>前方有通向格鬥場地下的樓梯。
下了這座樓梯後右手邊的房間，
有許多關著怪物們的牢籠。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52316.en:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>That's weird... it's my first time here,
so why do I already know all this stuff?
Well, never mind...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52316.ja:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あれっ？　はじめて行く場所なのに
　なんで　私　そんなことまで知ってるんだろ？
　……まあ　いっか。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52316.ko:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 어라? 처음 와 본 곳인데
　내가 어떻게 그런 것까지 아는 거지?
　……뭐, 아무렴 어때.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52316.zh-Hans:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>咦？我明明是第一次来，
为什么会这么熟悉？
……算了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52316.zh-Hant:
<voice 00440_00052316><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>咦？我明明是第一次去，
為什麼會這麼熟悉？
……算了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52317.en:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Anyways, there's a soldier standing guard
in front of the stairs.
That's where you come in!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52317.ja:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「でね　その地下へ降りる階段の前に
　見張りの兵士さんが　いるのよ。
　そこで　<pc>さんの出番ってわけ！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52317.ko:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아무튼 그 지하로 내려가는
　계단 앞에 감시병이 있거든.
　그 사람들을 <pc> 씨가 맡아 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52317.zh-Hans:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>然后，在通往地下的楼梯前
有负责看守的士兵。
这里就轮到<pc>出场了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52317.zh-Hant:
<voice 00500_00052317><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>然後，在通往地下的樓梯前
有負責看守的士兵。
這裡就輪到<pc>出場了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52318.en:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Show Clawde to the soldier and say you
captured him, and the guard should let you
pass through to the cells.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52318.ja:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「その兵士さんに　チョメを見せて
　キラーパンサーを捕まえてきたって言えば
　地下のオリまで　通してくれるはずよ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52318.ko:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그 병사들한테 초메를 보여 주면서
　킬러 팬서를 잡아 왔다고 하면
　지하 우리에 들여보내 줄 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52318.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>把乔麦给那些士兵看，
告诉他们你抓来了杀人豹，
应该就会带你去地下牢笼。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52318.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00052318><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>把喬麥給那些士兵看，
告訴他們捉到殺人豹了，
應該就會讓你進去地下牢籠了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52319.en:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>The king is suspicious of me, and the
soldiers know my face already... so it
should be fine if you talk to them.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52319.ja:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私は　王様に目をつけられてるから
　兵士さんたちにも　顔を知られてるだろうけど
　あなたが交渉してくれれば　きっと大丈夫。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52319.ko:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 난 왕에게 밉보였으니
　병사들도 얼굴을 기억하겠지만
　<pc> 씨가 상대하면 문제없을 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52319.zh-Hans:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我被国王盯上了，
士兵也知道我的长相，
但你去的话一定可以的。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52319.zh-Hant:
<voice 00580_00052319><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我被國王盯上了，
士兵也知道我的長相，
但你去的話一定可以的。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52320.en:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>When you get to the cells,
leave the rest to me.
I'll let the monsters escape in style!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52320.ja:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「オリの前まで来たら　あとは　私にまかせて。
　華麗に　捕まってる魔物たちを
　逃がしてみせるわっ！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52320.ko:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 우리 앞까지 가면 그 뒤는 나한테 맡겨.
　붙잡힌 마물들을 순식간에 풀어 줄 테니까!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52320.zh-Hans:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>到地下牢笼后就交给我吧。
我会把被抓住的怪物们全放走！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52320.zh-Hant:
<voice 00610_00052320><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>到地下牢籠後就交給我吧。
我會華麗地幫
被捉的怪物們逃脫的！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52321.en:
<voice 00650_00052321><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Until then, Clawde and I will follow quietly behind
you. Good luck, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52321.ja:
<voice 00650_00052321><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「それまで　私とチョメは　あなたの後ろに
　ひっそり　ついていくから。
　じゃあ　お願いね　<pc>さん！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52321.ko:
<voice 00650_00052321><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그때까지 나랑 초메는
　<pc> 씨 뒤에서 살금살금 따라갈게.

<voice 00465_00052323><start_lip_sync n02044 _normal m00001>What! You captured the escaped Great Sabrecat? Ooh,

52330.en: <voice 02250_00052330><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm setting you all free!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02550_00052332><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You don't have to stay here anymore. Let's all get

<voice 02550_00052332><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이제 여기 있을 필요 없어.

<voice 02550_00052332><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你们不用继续留在这里了。

<voice 02550_00052332><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你們不必待在這裡了，

52335.en:
One after another, Seraphy unlocked the cells and set
the monsters free.
52335.ja:
セラフィは　次々とカギを開けて
魔物たちを　逃がしていった。
52335.ko:
세라피는 차례차례 문을 열어
마물들을 풀어 주었다.
52335.zh-Hans:
赛拉菲把笼子挨个打开，
将怪物放走了。
52335.zh-Hant:
賽拉菲不斷打開牢籠，
放怪物們出去。

52336.en: <voice 03035_00052336><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>This is the last one.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 03125_00052337><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「チョメ！

52337.ko:
<voice 03125_00052337><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 초메!

<voice 03125_00052337><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>乔麦！

<voice 03125_00052337><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>喬麥！

52340.en: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>What... Was that?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52340.ja: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「今のは……　なに？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52340.ko: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 방금 그건…… 뭐지?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52340.zh-Hans: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>刚刚的……是什么？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52340.zh-Hant: <voice 03655_00052340><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>剛才那是……什麼？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52341.ja:
<voice 03825_00052341><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私……　前にも
　この場所に　来たことがある……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52341.ko:
<voice 03825_00052341><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 난…… 전에도
　여기 온 적이 있어…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52341.zh-Hans:
<voice 03825_00052341><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我……之前
也来过这里……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52341.zh-Hant:
<voice 03825_00052341><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我之前……
來過這裡……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52342.en: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Back then... When they went to war.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52342.ja: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あのとき……　戦争に行くときだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52342.ko: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그때…… 전쟁터에 갈 때야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52342.zh-Hans: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那时……是要上战场。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52342.zh-Hant: <voice 03935_00052342><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那是……要去打仗的時候。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52343.en:
<voice 04070_00052343><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>You're completely out of line, Bermud!
You promised you would help in the war!
Hurry up and release those monsters!<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52343.ja:
<voice 04070_00052343><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>「往生際が　悪いぞ　ベルムド！！
　この戦争に手を貸すと　約束したはずだ。
　早く　魔物たちを　オリから出せ！<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52343.ko:
<voice 04070_00052343><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>: 그만하지 못하겠나, 벨무드!!
　이 전쟁에 협력하겠다고 약속했을 텐데?
　어서 마물들을 우리에서 꺼내게!<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52343.zh-Hans:
<voice 04070_00052343><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德，不要再推脱了！
你答应过要为战争出力，
快把怪物们从笼子里放出来！<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52343.zh-Hant:
<voice 04070_00052343><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>太難看了，貝爾穆德！！
你答應過我會幫我打這場仗吧。
快把怪物們從牢籠中放出來！<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52344.ja: <voice 04155_00052344><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>「ですが　兵士長……。<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52344.ko: <voice 04155_00052344><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>: 하지만 병사단장님…….<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52344.zh-Hans: <voice 04155_00052344><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>可是，士兵长……<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52344.zh-Hant: <voice 04155_00052344><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>但是，士兵長……<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52345.en:
<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>If you don't cooperate, then I shall have
them killed where they stand. Got it?<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52345.ja:
<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>「我らに　協力できないと言うなら
　こやつらなど　この場で
　始末してやってもいいのだぞ。ん～？<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52345.ko:
<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>: 우리에게 협력하지 않겠다면
　이놈들을 이 자리에서
　죽여도 상관없네. 어쩔 텐가?<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52345.zh-Hans:
<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>如果你不跟我们合作，
我现在就处理掉这些家伙。
怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52345.zh-Hant:
<voice 04355_00052345><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>要是我說不幫，
也可以直接在這裡
處理掉牠們喔。嗯～？<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52346.en:
<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>Now, listen up.
<auto_br=1000>
These monsters will be our shields.
They should be grateful to
be given such a heroic duty!<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52346.ja:
<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>「いいか。この魔物たちは　我々の盾となるのだ。
　魔物ごときが　こんな名誉ある仕事を
　与えてもらえるなんて　ありがたく思えよ。<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52346.ko:
<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>: 잘 듣게, 이 마물들은 우리의 방패인 걸세.
　마물 주제에 이런 명예로운 임무를
　맡게 되다니 고맙게 생각해야지.<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52346.zh-Hans:
<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>你听好了。这群怪物是我们的肉盾。
区区怪物可以承担如此光荣的任务，
你应该打心眼里觉得感激。<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52346.zh-Hant:
<voice 04465_00052346><start_lip_sync n02045 _normal m00001>你聽好了，這些怪物是我們的肉盾。
怪物們應該感謝我
讓牠們獲得如此殊榮才對。<stop_lip_animation n02045 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52347.en: <voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>...I'm sorry, everyone.<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52347.ja: <voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>「……すまない　みんな。<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52347.zh-Hans: <voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>……抱歉，大伙儿。<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52347.zh-Hant: <voice 04960_00052347><start_lip_sync n02236 _normal m00001>……抱歉，大家。<stop_lip_animation n02236 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52348.ja: <voice 05190_00052348><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさん……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52348.ko: <voice 05190_00052348><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52348.zh-Hans: <voice 05190_00052348><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52348.zh-Hant: <voice 05190_00052348><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52350.en:
<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>... I just remembered something.
...Bermud, we have to stop him!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52350.ja:
<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん……。私　思いだしたよ。
　……ベルムドさんを　止めなきゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52350.ko:
<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨……. 나 기억났어.
　……벨무드 씨를 막아야 해!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52350.zh-Hans:
<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>……我想起来了。
……一定要阻止贝尔穆德！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52350.zh-Hant:
<voice 05435_00052350><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>……我想起來了。
……必須阻止貝爾穆德先生才行！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52351.en:
<voice 05530_00052351><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Leave this room and go to the right,
and it'll lead to a room with an elevator.
That'll take you to where Bermud is...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52351.ja:
<voice 05530_00052351><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「この部屋を出て　右に行った所の扉を開けると
　闘いの広間に出る　エレベーターがあるんだ。
　ベルムドさんは　今　そこにいるはずよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52351.ko:
<voice 05530_00052351><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이 방 밖으로 나가서 오른쪽에 있는 문을 열면
　싸움의 방과 연결된 엘리베이터가 있어.
　벨무드 씨는 지금 거기 있을 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52351.zh-Hans:
<voice 05530_00052351><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>从这个房间出去，往右走打开门，
能看到去竞技大厅的升降机。
贝尔穆德现在应该在那里……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52351.zh-Hant:
<voice 05530_00052351><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>出了房間後打開右手邊的門，
會有去競技大廳的升降機。
貝爾穆德先生現在應該就在那裡……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52352.en:
<voice 05825_00052352><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I might be risking my life here. But now that I've
remembered, I can't ignore this... I gotta go!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52352.ja:
<voice 05825_00052352><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「もしかしたら　命がけになるかもしれない。
　でも　思いだした以上　放っておけないから……
　私　行ってくるね！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52352.ko:
<voice 05825_00052352><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 어쩌면 목숨을 걸어야 할지도 몰라.
　하지만 기억해 낸 이상 가만있을 순 없어……
　나, 다녀올게!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52352.zh-Hans:
<voice 05825_00052352><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>也许会有性命危险。
但是我既然已经想起来了，就不能不管……
我走了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52352.zh-Hant:
<voice 05825_00052352><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>或許會有生命危險。
但是既然我想起來了，就不能放手不管……
我這就去！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000541.en:
<voice 05826_29000541><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Please wait! Calm down!
It's hopeless to face them by yourself...
Truly, it's dangerous to go alone, take us!<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000541.ja:
<voice 05826_29000541><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「待ってください！　落ち着いて！
　ひとりでは……だめだ　よく見えない……。
　とにかく　ひとりで行くのは　危ない気が！<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000541.ko:
<voice 05826_29000541><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 잠시만요! 진정하세요!
　혼자서는…… 안 돼, 잘 보이지 않아…….
　아무튼 혼자 가는 건 위험해요!<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000541.zh-Hans:
<voice 05826_29000541><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>请等一下！冷静点！
一个人……不行，没办法清楚地看见未来……
总之我觉得一个人去很危险！<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000541.zh-Hant:
<voice 05826_29000541><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>請等一下！冷靜點！
一個人……不行，沒辦法清楚地看見未來……
總之我覺得一個人去很危險！<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000542.en:
<voice 05827_29000542><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Risking your life like that is no good!
I'll help! Friends help each other,
just like the Azlantelope!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000542.ja:
<voice 05827_29000542><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「その前に　命がけなんてダメ！
　手伝うよ！　仲間どうしは
　カムシカたちみたいに　助け合うの！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000542.ko:
<voice 05827_29000542><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 그 전에 목숨을 건다니 말도 안 돼!
　우리도 도울게! 동료는
　카무시카처럼 서로 도와야 하니까!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000542.zh-Hans:
<voice 05827_29000542><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>更重要的是，不可以赌命！
我来帮忙！伙伴就要像
神鹿一样互相帮忙！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000542.zh-Hant:
<voice 05827_29000542><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>更重要的是，不可以賭命！
我來幫忙！夥伴就要像
神鹿一樣互相幫忙！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52353.ja: <voice 00215_00052353><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさん！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52353.ko: <voice 00215_00052353><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52353.zh-Hans: <voice 00215_00052353><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52353.zh-Hant: <voice 00215_00052353><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52354.en:
<voice 00328_00052354><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>The Survival Deathmatch has been canceled!
All the monsters have escaped!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52354.ja:
<voice 00328_00052354><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「サバイバルデスマッチは　中止よ！
　魔物は　みんな　逃がしてしまったもの！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52354.ko:
<voice 00328_00052354><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 서바이벌 데스 매치는 중지야!
　마물들은 내가 다 풀어 줬으니까!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52354.zh-Hans:
<voice 00328_00052354><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>死亡生存赛办不成了！
我已经把怪物都放走了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52354.zh-Hant:
<voice 00328_00052354><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>生存死亡競賽中止！
因為我已經放走所有怪物了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52355.en: <voice 00410_00052355><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>What did you say...?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52355.ja: <voice 00410_00052355><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「なんだと……？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52355.zh-Hans: <voice 00410_00052355><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>……你说什么！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52356.en:
<voice 00600_00052356><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>Don't let any of them escape!
If they resist, kill them.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52356.ja:
<voice 00600_00052356><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「今すぐ　逃げた魔物を追え！
　抵抗するようなら　殺しても構わん。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52356.ko:
<voice 00600_00052356><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: 당장 달아난 마물을 쫓아라!
　저항하면 죽여도 상관없다.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52356.zh-Hans:
<voice 00600_00052356><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>赶快去追逃走的怪物！
如果它们反抗就当场杀掉。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52356.zh-Hant:
<voice 00600_00052356><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>快去追逃走的怪物！
要是抵抗，殺了也無所謂。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52357.en: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Stop that already.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52357.ja: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「もう　そんなマネは　やめて。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52357.ko: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이제 그런 짓은 그만해.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52357.zh-Hans: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>不要再做那种事了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52357.zh-Hant: <voice 00650_00052357><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>別再做這樣的事了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

55379.en:
<voice 00730_00055379><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You are not the king of this land!
You are...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55379.ja:
<voice 00730_00055379><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あなたは　この国の王様なんかじゃないでしょ！
　あなたはっ……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55379.ko:
<voice 00730_00055379><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 당신은 이 나라의 왕 같은 게 아니잖아!
　당신은……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55379.zh-Hans:
<voice 00730_00055379><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你不是这个国家的国王对吧！
你是……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55379.zh-Hant:
<voice 00730_00055379><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你不是這個國家的國王吧！
你是……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52358.en: <voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You're Bermud, the Monster Master, aren't you!?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52358.ja:
<voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あなたは　まもの使いの
　ベルムドさんでしょう！？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52358.ko: <voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 당신은 마물 조련사 벨무드 씨잖아!?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52358.zh-Hans: <voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你是驯魔师贝尔穆德吧？！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52358.zh-Hant: <voice 00825_00052358><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你是馴魔師貝爾穆德先生吧！？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52359.en:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>The great Monster Master shown on that
monument is... You, isn't it?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52359.ja:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「岩山のレリーフに描かれている
　偉大な　まもの使いって……
　ベルムドさんのことなんでしょ？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52359.ko:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 바위산 부조에 새겨진
　위대한 마물 조련사는……
　벨무드 씨 맞지?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52359.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>岩山的浮雕上刻的
伟大的驯魔师……
就是你吧？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52359.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00052359><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>岩山浮雕刻的偉大馴魔師……
就是貝爾穆德先生對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52360.en: <voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I remember you... And I remember who I am.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52360.ja:
<voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「……私　思いだしたの。
　あなたのことも　自分が何者なのかも。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52360.ko:
<voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: ……나 다 기억났어.
　당신이 누군지, 내가 누구였는지도.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52360.zh-Hans:
<voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……我已经想起来了。
你的事，还有我自己的事。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52360.zh-Hant:
<voice 01025_00052360><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……我想起來了。
你和我究竟是誰。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52361.en:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>How could you, who loved the monsters
so much, treat them so badly...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52361.ja:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「魔物たちを　深く愛していた　あなたが
　どうして　格闘場の魔物たちに
　あんな　むごい仕打ちを……？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52361.ko:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그렇게나 마물을 사랑했던
　당신이 왜 격투장의 마물들에게
　그런 잔인한 짓을 하는 거야……?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52361.zh-Hans:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>深爱着怪物的你
为什么要那样对待
格斗场的怪物？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52361.zh-Hant:
<voice 01140_00052361><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>為何深愛怪物們的你，
會讓格鬥場的怪物們
遭受那樣殘酷的對待……？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52362.en: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>...They deserve to die.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52362.ja: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「……やつらは　死んで当然の存在だ。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52362.ko: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: ……그놈들은 죽어 마땅한 존재다.<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52362.zh-Hans: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>……那些家伙死有余辜。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52362.zh-Hant: <voice 01310_00052362><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>……牠們都該死。<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52363.en:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>They are the vile, sinful bastards who
used my students as shields while they
continued to live their disgusting lives!<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52363.ja:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「私の　かわいい教え子たちを
　戦争の盾に使って　醜く　生き延びた
　卑劣で罪深い　やつらなのだ！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52363.ko:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: 내 사랑하는 제자들을
　방패막이로 써먹고 추잡하게 살아남은
　비열하고 죄 많은 자들이다!<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52363.zh-Hans:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>那群家伙卑鄙无耻，罪孽深重！
将我可爱的孩子们推上战场当肉盾，
就为了保住自己的小命！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52363.zh-Hant:
<voice 01380_00052363><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>那些傢伙既卑鄙又罪孽深重，
把我可愛的孩子們當作戰爭的肉盾，
就只是為了苟活！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52364.en: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>War shield? But that's...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52364.ja: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「戦争の盾？　それって……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52364.ko: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 방패막이로 써먹어? 그 말은…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52364.zh-Hans: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>推上战场当肉盾？那是……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52364.zh-Hant: <voice 01450_00052364><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>戰爭的肉盾？也就是……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

55380.en:
<voice 01560_00055380><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Could it be that the monsters in the cells
are the soldiers who went to war...?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55380.ja:
<voice 01560_00055380><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「もしかして　あのオリにいた魔物たちは
　一緒に　戦争へ向かった　兵士さん……？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55380.ko:
<voice 01560_00055380><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 설마 그 우리에 있던 마물들은
　같이 전쟁터로 향했던 병사들……?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55380.zh-Hans:
<voice 01560_00055380><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>难道说笼子里的怪物们
是当时一起上战场的士兵？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
55380.zh-Hant:
<voice 01560_00055380><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>難道牢籠裡的怪物們
就是當時一起上戰場的士兵……？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52366.en: <voice 01770_00052366><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud... Can't we just end this already? Haven't they already suffered enough.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52366.ja:
<voice 01770_00052366><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「……ベルムドさん。もう　終わりにしよう？
　そうだとしても　あの人たちだって　きっと
　充分　苦しい思いをしたわ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52366.ko:
<voice 01770_00052366><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: ……벨무드 씨, 이제 그만하자.
　설사 그렇다 해도 그 사람들도 이미
　충분히 고통받았어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52366.zh-Hans:
<voice 01770_00052366><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……贝尔穆德，到此为止吧？
就算真是你说的那样，
那些人也已经吃够苦头了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52366.zh-Hant:
<voice 01770_00052366><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……貝爾穆德先生，放手吧？
就算這樣，那些人應該也都嘗夠苦頭了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52367.en:
<voice 01850_00052367><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>SERAPHY! WHY DO YOU STILL STAND BY THOSE BASTARDS
EVEN AFTER GETTING YOUR MEMORY BACK!?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52367.ja:
<voice 01850_00052367><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「セラフィッ！
　なぜ　お前は　過去を取り戻してなお
　あんな鬼畜どもに　肩入れする！？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52367.ko:
<voice 01850_00052367><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: 세라피!
　넌 왜 과거의 기억을 되찾고도
　그 짐승 같은 놈들을 두둔하는 거냐!?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52367.zh-Hans:
<voice 01850_00052367><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>赛拉菲！
你明明找回了记忆，
为何还要帮那群畜牲说话？！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52367.zh-Hant:
<voice 01850_00052367><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>賽拉菲！
為什麼妳想起一切之後，
卻還是站在他們那邊！？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52368.ja: <voice 01943_00052368><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「……もう　よい！！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52369.ja: <voice 02005_00052369><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「その者たちを　捕らえよ！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52369.ko: <voice 02005_00052369><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: 이놈들을 붙잡아라!<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52369.zh-Hans: <voice 02005_00052369><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>把他们抓起来！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52369.zh-Hant: <voice 02005_00052369><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>捉住他們！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52370.ja: <voice 02532_00052370><start_lip_sync m14103 _normal m00001>「ガルルル……。<stop_lip_animation m14103 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52370.zh-Hans: <voice 02532_00052370><start_lip_sync m14103 _normal m00001>吼哦哦哦……<stop_lip_animation m14103 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52370.zh-Hant: <voice 02532_00052370><start_lip_sync m14103 _normal m00001>吼喔喔喔……<stop_lip_animation m14103 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52371.en:
<voice 02639_00052371><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>W-why have you come back?!
No way... Seraphi's...?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52371.ja:
<voice 02639_00052371><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「な…なぜ　戻ってきた！？
　まさか　セラフィを……？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52371.ko:
<voice 02639_00052371><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: 왜… 왜 돌아온 거지!?
　설마 세라피를……?<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52371.zh-Hans:
<voice 02639_00052371><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>为……为什么要回来？！
难道是为了救赛拉菲？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52371.zh-Hant:
<voice 02639_00052371><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>為……為何回來了！？
難道是為了賽拉菲……？<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52372.en:
<voice 02902_00052372><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>...Heh! This is quite convenient!
With the power he gave me, I shall
now avenge my students!<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52372.ja:
<voice 02902_00052372><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「……いや　むしろ　好都合よ！
　あの方から　たまわったチカラで
　今こそ　教え子たちの復讐を遂げてやる！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52372.ko:
<voice 02902_00052372><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>: ……아니, 오히려 잘됐군!
　그분께 받은 힘으로
　지금 이 자리에서 제자들의 원수를 갚겠다!<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52372.zh-Hans:
<voice 02902_00052372><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>……没关系，不如说来得正好！
我要用从那位大人那里得到的力量
为我的孩子们复仇！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52372.zh-Hant:
<voice 02902_00052372><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>……不對，正好！
我現在就用那位大人給我的力量，
幫我可愛的孩子們報仇！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52373.ja: <voice 03012_00052373><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>「…………グルァァァァァァァ！！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52373.zh-Hans: <voice 03012_00052373><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>…………吼哦啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52373.zh-Hant: <voice 03012_00052373><start_lip_sync n02036 _normal m00001>…………吼喔啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation n02036 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52375.en:
<voice 03555_00052375><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>Anyone who gets in the way of my
vengeance will be eliminated!<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52375.ja:
<voice 03555_00052375><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「我が復讐を　ジャマする者は
　皆　排除してくれるわ！！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52375.ko:
<voice 03555_00052375><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 내 복수를 방해하는 놈들은
　모두 없애 버리겠다!!<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52375.zh-Hans:
<voice 03555_00052375><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>妨碍我复仇的人
通通都得死！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52375.zh-Hant:
<voice 03555_00052375><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>我要除掉所有
阻撓我復仇的人！！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52380.en: <voice 00420_00052380><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>I refuse to die until they are all dead...<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52380.ja: <voice 00420_00052380><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「やつらを皆殺しにするまで　私は死ねぬ……。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52380.ko:
<voice 00420_00052380><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 저놈들을 모두 없애기 전에는
　죽을 수 없다…….<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52380.zh-Hans: <voice 00420_00052380><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>在把那些家伙杀光前，我不能死……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52380.zh-Hant: <voice 00420_00052380><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>除非殺光他們，不然我不會死的……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52381.en: <voice 00970_00052381><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud, that's enough!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52381.ja: <voice 00970_00052381><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさん　もう　やめて！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52381.ko: <voice 00970_00052381><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨, 이제 그만해!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52381.zh-Hans: <voice 00970_00052381><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德，住手吧！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52381.zh-Hant: <voice 00970_00052381><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生，快住手！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52382.en:
<voice 01075_00052382><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>Why are you defending them!? These fiendish bastards
treated the lives of your friends like trash to be
thrown away!<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52382.ja:
<voice 01075_00052382><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「なぜ　かばう！？
　あいつらは　お前の　仲間たちの命を
　物のように扱い　切り捨てた　凶悪な奴らだぞ！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52382.ko:
<voice 01075_00052382><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 왜 감싸는 거냐!?
　저놈들은 네 동료들의 목숨을
　물건처럼 쓰고 버린 악랄한 놈들이다!<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52382.zh-Hans:
<voice 01075_00052382><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>为什么保护它们？！
那群可恶的家伙视你伙伴们的性命如草芥，
轻易地牺牲了它们！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52382.zh-Hant:
<voice 01075_00052382><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>妳為何包庇他們！？
他們可是將妳的夥伴們的性命
當作道具隨意拋棄的惡徒！<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52383.en: <voice 01205_00052383><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud... Have you forgotten? What you always said.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52383.ja:
<voice 01205_00052383><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさん……。忘れてしまったの？
　あなたが　いつも言ってたのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52383.ko:
<voice 01205_00052383><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨……. 잊은 거야?
　당신이 늘 그랬잖아.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52383.zh-Hans:
<voice 01205_00052383><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德……你忘了吗？
你以前总说一句话。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52383.zh-Hant:
<voice 01205_00052383><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生……你忘了嗎？
你以前常說的。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52384.en:
<voice 01285_00052384><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>''One cannot be a true Monster Master without a heart
that accepts even the most vicious of monsters''...
You said that!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52384.ja:
<voice 01285_00052384><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「まもの使いに　いちばん必要なのは
　どんな凶悪な魔物でも
　受け入れ　許す心だ……って！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52384.ko:
<voice 01285_00052384><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 마물 조련사에게 가장 중요한 건
　그 어떤 흉악한 마물일지라도
　수용하고 용서하는 마음이라고……!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52384.zh-Hans:
<voice 01285_00052384><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>做驯魔师最重要的就是
无论多么凶恶的怪物，
都能接受并包容它……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52384.zh-Hant:
<voice 01285_00052384><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>對馴魔師來說，最重要
就是不論多兇猛的怪物，
都能夠接納的心啊……！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52386.en: <voice 02505_00052386><start_lip_sync n02237 _normal m00001>Are you alright? You are not hurt, are you?<stop_lip_animation n02237 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52386.ja: <voice 02505_00052386><start_lip_sync n02237 _normal m00001>「大丈夫か？　ケガはないか！？<stop_lip_animation n02237 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52386.ko: <voice 02505_00052386><start_lip_sync n02237 _normal m00001>: 괜찮나? 다친 데는 없나!?<stop_lip_animation n02237 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52386.zh-Hans: <voice 02505_00052386><start_lip_sync n02237 _normal m00001>你没事吧？没受伤吧？！<stop_lip_animation n02237 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52386.zh-Hant: <voice 02505_00052386><start_lip_sync n02237 _normal m00001>沒事吧？沒受傷吧！？<stop_lip_animation n02237 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52387.ja: <voice 02715_00052387><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさん！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52387.ko: <voice 02715_00052387><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨!!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52387.zh-Hans: <voice 02715_00052387><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52387.zh-Hant: <voice 02715_00052387><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52389.en: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>It's hopeless... That's enough, Seraphy.<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52389.ja: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「無駄だ……。もういい　セラフィ。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52389.ko: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 소용없어……. 그만 됐다, 세라피.<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52389.zh-Hans: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>没用的……放弃吧，赛拉菲。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52389.zh-Hant: <voice 02930_00052389><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>沒用的……夠了，賽拉菲。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52390.en: <voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>No... Bermud. How could I let this happen...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52390.ja:
<voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「そんな……。ベルムドさん。
　なぜ　こんなことに……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52390.ko:
<voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그럴 수가……. 벨무드 씨.
　왜 이런 일이…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52390.zh-Hans:
<voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>别这样说……贝尔穆德。
怎么会这样……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52390.zh-Hant:
<voice 03116_00052390><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>怎麼會……貝爾穆德先生，
為什麼要這樣……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52391.en:
<voice 03325_00052391><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>Heheh... You aren't just my former partner, but the
only one who could reclaim their memories...<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52391.ja:
<voice 03325_00052391><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「フフッ。私の教え子ではない　お前だけが
　ただひとり　過去を取り戻すとはな……。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52391.ko:
<voice 03325_00052391><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 후후, 내 제자가 아닌 너만이
　유일하게 과거의 기억을 되찾다니…….<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52391.zh-Hans:
<voice 03325_00052391><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>哈哈。没想到不是我的孩子们，
而是只有你想起了过去……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52391.zh-Hant:
<voice 03325_00052391><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>呵呵，沒想到就只有
不是我孩子的妳恢復了記憶……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52392.en:
<voice 03515_00052392><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>It's all thanks to that... Bond with him, isn't it?
Before I knew it, I seem to have lost what it truly
means to be a Monster Master...<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52392.ja:
<voice 03515_00052392><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>「それもこれも……　ヤツとの絆のおかげか。
　私は　まもの使いにとって　大事なものを
　いつの間にか　失っていたよう…だ……。<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52392.ko:
<voice 03515_00052392><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>: 그것도 다…… 그 녀석과의 유대 덕분인가.
　난 마물 조련사에게 가장 중요한 것을
　어느샌가 잃어버렸던 것 같…다…….<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52392.zh-Hans:
<voice 03515_00052392><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>这都是……源自你和他的牵绊吗？
我似乎在不知不觉间，
忘记了作为一名驯魔师最重要的东西……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52392.zh-Hant:
<voice 03515_00052392><start_lip_sync m50070 _normal m00001>這也是……多虧了和牠之間的情誼嗎？
我似乎在不知不覺間丟失了
身為馴魔師最重要的東西……<stop_lip_animation m50070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52393.ja: <voice 03810_00052393><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「……ベルムドさん？　ベルムドさんっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52393.ko: <voice 03810_00052393><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: ……벨무드 씨? 벨무드 씨!!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52393.zh-Hans: <voice 03810_00052393><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……贝尔穆德？贝尔穆德！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52393.zh-Hant: <voice 03810_00052393><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……貝爾穆德先生？貝爾穆德先生！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52394.en: <voice 04045_00052394><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>I had no idea that the King was actually a monster...<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52394.ja: <voice 04045_00052394><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「ベルムド王の正体が　魔物だったとは……。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52394.ko: <voice 04045_00052394><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 왕의 정체가 마물이었을 줄이야…….<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52394.zh-Hans: <voice 04045_00052394><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>没想到贝尔穆德王其实是怪物……<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52394.zh-Hant: <voice 04045_00052394><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>沒想到貝爾穆德王的真身竟然是怪物……<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52395.en:
<voice 04175_00052395><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>The monster impersonating the king and
inciting the citizens has been felled by
my soldiers of Gran Zedora!<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52395.ja:
<voice 04175_00052395><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「王になりすまし　国民を扇動していた魔物は
　我ら　グランゼドーラ兵が討ち取った！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52395.ko:
<voice 04175_00052395><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 왕으로 둔갑해 국민들을 선동한 마물은
　우리 그랑제도라군이 물리쳤다!<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52395.zh-Hans:
<voice 04175_00052395><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>我古兰泽朵拉的士兵已经打倒了
假扮国王，煽动国民的怪物！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52395.zh-Hant:
<voice 04175_00052395><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>偽裝成國王，煽動國民的怪物，
已經由我古蘭澤朵拉的士兵成功討伐！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52396.en:
<voice 04290_00052396><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>From here on, the citizens of Arahaghiro's safety
shall be guaranteed by the Kingdom of Gran Zedora.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52396.ja:
<voice 04290_00052396><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「これより　アラハギーロの民の安全は
　我がグランゼドーラ王国が　保障しよう。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52396.ko:
<voice 04290_00052396><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 이제부터 아라하길로 국민의 안전은
　우리 그랑제도라 왕국이 책임지겠다.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52396.zh-Hans:
<voice 04290_00052396><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>今后艾拉哈奇罗人民的安全
就由我古兰泽朵拉王国来保障。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52396.zh-Hant:
<voice 04290_00052396><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>艾拉哈奇羅民眾們的安全，
就由我古蘭澤朵拉王國來保護。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52397.en: <voice 04451_00052397><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>Tell that to your people!<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52397.ja: <voice 04451_00052397><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「国民にも　そのように伝えよ！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52397.ko: <voice 04451_00052397><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 국민들에게도 그리 전하도록!<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52397.zh-Hans: <voice 04451_00052397><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>请把这件事转告国民们！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52397.zh-Hant: <voice 04451_00052397><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>向你們的國民們如此宣布吧！<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52398.en: <voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Thank you, <cs_pchero>... For helping me stop Bermud...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52398.ja:
<voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<cs_pchero>さん。
　ベルムドさんを止めてくれて……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52398.ko:
<voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 고마워, <cs_pchero> 씨.
　벨무드 씨를 막아 줘서…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52398.zh-Hans:
<voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<cs_pchero>。
你帮我阻止了贝尔穆德……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52398.zh-Hant:
<voice 05580_00052398><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<cs_pchero>。
謝謝你阻止了貝爾穆德先生……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52399.en:
<voice 05635_00052399><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You may have already guessed it, but... I was
originally a monster.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52399.ja:
<voice 05635_00052399><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「もう　わかってるかもしれないけど
　……私　もともとは　魔物なの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52399.ko:
<voice 05635_00052399><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이미 눈치챘겠지만
　……난 원래 마물이었어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52399.zh-Hans:
<voice 05635_00052399><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>也许你已经知道了……
我原本是一只怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52399.zh-Hant:
<voice 05635_00052399><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>你可能已經知道了，
我其實……是怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52400.en:
<voice 05770_00052400><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Before I took this form, I served as a Monster
Master's Healslime...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52400.ja:
<voice 05770_00052400><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「この姿になる前は　ある　まもの使いに仕える
　ホイミスライムだったんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52400.ko:
<voice 05770_00052400><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이 모습이 되기 전에는
　한 마물 조련사가 부리는
　호이미 슬라임이었어…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52400.zh-Hans:
<voice 05770_00052400><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我在变成这样之前，是跟随在
一位驯魔师身边的霍伊米史莱姆……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52400.zh-Hant:
<voice 05770_00052400><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我變成這樣之前，
曾是侍奉某位馴魔師的霍伊米史萊姆……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52401.en:
<voice 05905_00052401><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Hey, <cs_pchero>. After this, could you come to
Murudo Mountain? I want to tell you all everything
that happened.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52401.ja:
<voice 05905_00052401><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ねぇ　<cs_pchero>さん。
　これから　ムルードの岩山へ来てくれる？
　みんなには　全部　話しておきたいんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52401.ko:
<voice 05905_00052401><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 있잖아, <cs_pchero> 씨.
　무르드 바위산으로 와 주지 않을래?
　<cs_pchero> 씨 일행에겐 다 털어놓고 싶어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52401.zh-Hans:
<voice 05905_00052401><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>。
你可以到穆鲁德岩山来吗？
我想跟大家说明一切。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52401.zh-Hant:
<voice 05905_00052401><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
你可以到穆魯德岩山來嗎？
我想跟大家說明一切。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000545.en:
<voice 06025_29000545><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'll be waiting at that relief we went to before,
okay.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000545.ja:
<voice 06025_29000545><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私　先に行って
　あのレリーフの所で　待ってるね。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000545.ko:
<voice 06025_29000545><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 난 먼저 가서
　그 부조가 있는 곳에서 기다릴게.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000545.zh-Hans:
<voice 06025_29000545><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我先去
浮雕那边等着。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000545.zh-Hant:
<voice 06025_29000545><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我先去
浮雕那邊等著。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000546.ja:
セラフィが
パーティから　外れた。
29000546.zh-Hans:
赛拉菲
脱离了队伍。
29000546.zh-Hant:
賽拉菲
脫離了隊伍。

52403.en:
<voice 00170_00052403><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Ah, <pc>. Sorry to call you all the
way out here.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52403.ja:
<voice 00170_00052403><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>さん。
　呼びつけちゃって　ごめんね。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52403.ko:
<voice 00170_00052403><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc> 씨.
　이런 곳까지 와달라고 해서 미안해.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52403.zh-Hans:
<voice 00170_00052403><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>。
抱歉把你叫来这里。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52403.zh-Hant:
<voice 00170_00052403><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>，
把你叫來這裡真不好意思。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52404.en:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It's thanks to you all that I got my lost memories
back.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52404.ja:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私が　過去を取り戻せたのは
　みんなの　おかげだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52404.ko:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 내가 과거의 기억을 되찾은 건
　<pc> 씨 일행 덕분이야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52404.zh-Hans:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我能回想起过去的事，
都是多亏了大家。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52404.zh-Hant:
<voice 00210_00052404><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我能想起一切
都是多虧了大家。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52405.en:
<voice 00240_00052405><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You helped me in so many ways, and I want to tell
you all what I rememebered about Bermud... Everything.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52405.ja:
<voice 00240_00052405><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「いろいろ助けてくれた　みんなには
　ベルムドさんのこと　私が思いだしたこと……
　全部　知っておいてほしいの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52405.ko:
<voice 00240_00052405><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 여러모로 도와준 <pc> 씨 일행에겐
　벨무드 씨에 관해, 그리고 내 과거에 관해……
　전부 알려 주고 싶어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52405.zh-Hans:
<voice 00240_00052405><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我想告诉帮了我的大家
关于贝尔穆德的事，
还有我想起来的事……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52405.zh-Hant:
<voice 00240_00052405><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>各位幫了我這麼多，我希望你們能知道……
關於貝爾穆德先生的事，
還有我想起來的所有事情。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52406.en:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud was a famous Monster Master. He used to manage
Arahaghiro's arena and was highly respected by all.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52406.ja:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさんは　有名な　まもの使いだったの。
　昔　アラハギーロの格闘場の管理人も　やってて
　みんなから　すごい尊敬されてたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52406.ko:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨는 유명한 마물 조련사였어.
　예전에는 아라하길로 격투장 관리인도 맡아서
　다들 벨무드 씨를 무척이나 존경했지.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52406.zh-Hans:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德曾经是有名的驯魔师。
过去担任过艾拉哈奇罗的格斗场管理人，
很受众人的尊敬。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52406.zh-Hant:
<voice 00280_00052406><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生是個有名的馴魔師。
以前也是艾拉哈奇羅格鬥場的管理人，
大家都非常尊敬他。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52407.en:
<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Earlier, I told you that before I took on this human
form, I served as a Monster Master's Healslime,
didn't I?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52407.ja:
<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「さっき　私が　人間の姿になる前は
　ある　まもの使いに仕えていた
　ホイミスライムだったって　言ったじゃない？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52407.ko:
<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아까 난 인간이 되기 전에는
　한 마물 조련사가 부리는
　호이미 슬라임이었다고 했잖아?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52407.zh-Hans:
<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我之前说过吧，我在变成人类前，
是跟随在一位驯魔师身边的
霍伊米史莱姆。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52407.zh-Hant:
<voice 00310_00052407><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我剛才說我在變成人類的樣子以前，
是侍奉於某位馴魔師的
霍伊米史萊姆對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52408.en:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>...Clawde here is actually the Monster Master was
serving, Kalevan.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52408.ja:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「……このチョメこそ　私が仕えてた
　まもの使いの　カレヴァンさんなの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52408.ko:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: ……여기 있는 초메가 날 부리던
　마물 조련사인 칼레반 씨야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52408.zh-Hans:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……乔麦就是我一直
跟随的驯魔师加雷班。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52408.zh-Hant:
<voice 00360_00052408><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>……喬麥就是我侍奉的馴魔師，
加雷班先生。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52409.en:
<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Bermud and Kalevan had trained under the same master
since they were little and were like brothers.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52409.ja:
<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「ベルムドさんと　カレヴァンさんは
　若い頃から　同じ師匠のもとで修行を積んだ
　兄弟みたいな関係だったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52409.ko:
<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 벨무드 씨와 칼레반 씨는
　젊은 시절부터 같은 스승님 밑에서 수련한
　형제 같은 사이였어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52409.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>贝尔穆德和加雷班
从年轻时起就跟在同一位师父身边学习，
关系如同兄弟一般。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52409.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_00052409><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>貝爾穆德先生和加雷班先生
從小就在同一位師父底下修行，
兩人情同手足。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52410.en:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Surprising... Isn't it? How did people and monsters
switch places... I wonder how such a thing could've
happened?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52410.ja:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「驚いた……よね？ 
　人間と魔物が　入れ替わってるなんて……。
　なんで　こんなことになっちゃったんだろ？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52410.ko:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 깜짝 놀랐지……?
　인간과 마물이 뒤바뀌다니…….
　왜 이런 일이 일어난 걸까?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52410.zh-Hans:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>很不可思议……吧？
人类居然和怪物互换了……
为什么会发生这种事？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52410.zh-Hant:
<voice 00440_00052410><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>很讓人驚訝……對吧？ 
人類竟然和怪物對調了……
為什麼會變成這樣呢？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52411.en:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm sure it's all because of that war... The war
against the great demon army.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52411.ja:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「きっと　すべては　あの戦争……
　魔族の大軍隊との戦いが　原因ね。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52411.ko:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아마 이 모든 건 그 전쟁……
　마족 대군과의 전쟁이 원인일 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52411.zh-Hans:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>一定是因为那场战争……
那场和魔族军队之间的战争。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52411.zh-Hant:
<voice 00490_00052411><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>一切的原因，就是那場戰爭……
與魔族的大軍隊間的戰爭。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52412.en:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>When the war broke out, this kingdom's army saw the
fighting potential of Bermud's monsters... Rather,
as sacrificial pawns to throw at the demons.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52412.ja:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「戦争が起こったとき　この国の軍隊は
　ベルムドさんの魔物たちを　戦力……いえ
　魔族にぶつける捨て石として　駆り出したの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52412.ko:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 전쟁이 일어났을 때 이 나라의 군대는
　벨무드 씨의 마물들을 전력…… 아니
　마족에게 돌격하기 위한 방패막이로 동원했어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52412.zh-Hans:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>发生战争时，这个国家的军队
将贝尔穆德的怪物们当作战斗力……不，
是当作弃子赶上了战场。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52412.zh-Hant:
<voice 00560_00052412><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>戰爭發生時，這個國家的軍隊
把貝爾穆德先生的怪物們當作戰力……
不對，是把牠們當作棄子使用。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52413.en:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Kalevan idolized Bermud and was determined to follow
him wherever he went... I went with Kalevan to war
too.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52413.ja:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「カレヴァンさんは　慕っていたベルムドさんに
　ずっと　ついていくって決めてて……
　私も　カレヴァンさんと　戦争へ向かったわ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52413.ko:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 칼레반 씨는 믿고 따르던 벨무드 씨와
　함께하기로 마음먹었고……
　나도 칼레반 씨와 함께 전쟁터로 향했어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52413.zh-Hans:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>加雷班非常仰慕贝尔穆德
决定一直跟随他……
我也和加雷班一起上了战场。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52413.zh-Hant:
<voice 00590_00052413><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>加雷班先生決定要跟隨
他所仰慕的貝爾穆德先生……
我也和加雷班先生一起參加了戰爭。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52414.en:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I'm not sure what happened after that,
but the next thing I knew I was a human,
and Kalevan was a Great Sabrecat...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52414.ja:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「そこで　何が起こったのか　わからないけど
　気がついたら　私は人間の姿で
　カレヴァンさんは　キラーパンサーに……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52414.ko:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 거기서 무슨 일이 있었는진 모르겠지만
　정신을 차리니 난 인간이 됐고
　칼레반 씨는 킬러 팬서가…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52414.zh-Hans:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我也不知道那时候发生了什么，
当我意识到的时候，自己已经变成了人类，
而加雷班变成了杀人豹……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52414.zh-Hant:
<voice 00660_00052414><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我不知道那裡發生了什麼事，
等回過神來，我已經變成人類，
加雷班先生則是變成殺人豹……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

74715.en:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Monsters we fought became Arahaghiro's
people, and the soldiers we sent to fight
became the arena's monsters.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74715.ja:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「一緒に戦争に向かった　格闘場の魔物たちは
　アラハギーロの民に。私たちを戦争に駆り出した
　兵士さんたちは　格闘場の魔物になっていたの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74715.ko:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 함께 전쟁터로 향한 격투장의 마물들은
　아라하길로의 주민이, 우리를 전쟁터로 내몬
　병사들은 격투장의 마물이 되어 있었어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74715.zh-Hans:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>一起上战场的那些格斗场里的怪物们
变成了艾拉哈奇罗的居民，而把我们
赶上战场的士兵们变成了格斗场里的怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
74715.zh-Hant:
<voice 00690_00074715><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>一同前往戰場的格鬥場怪物成了
艾拉哈奇羅的百姓。而把我們趕上戰場的
士兵們則變成了格鬥場的怪物。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52415.en:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Because of that war, all the people in
this country were transformed...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52415.ja:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あの戦争のせいで　この国の歯車が
　全部　くるっちゃったんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52415.ko:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그 전쟁 때문에 이 나라의 톱니바퀴가
　모두 어긋난 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52415.zh-Hans:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>因为那场战争，
这个国家全乱套了……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52415.zh-Hant:
<voice 00705_00052415><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>因為那場戰爭，
國家完全脫序了……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52416.en:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>But I want to say just one thing. Bermud
was not a bad person. He was a very
kind man who loved monsters very much.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52416.ja:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「でも　<pc>さん　これだけは言わせて。
　ベルムドさんは　決して　悪い人じゃない。
　魔物を愛する　とてもいい人だったのよ？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52416.ko:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 하지만 <pc> 씨, 이건 단언할 수 있어.
　벨무드 씨는 절대 나쁜 사람이 아니야.
　마물을 사랑하는 정말 착한 사람이었어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52416.zh-Hans:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>但是<pc>，有一句话我一定要说。
贝尔穆德不是坏人。
他是一个热爱怪物的好人。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52416.zh-Hant:
<voice 00740_00052416><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>可是我必須先和<pc>說清楚，
貝爾穆德先生絕不是個壞人。
他是個深愛怪物的大好人喔？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52417.en:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>It was his compassion for monsters--for us...
that made him into the man he was...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52417.ja:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「魔物を……　私たちを　思いやる心が
　ベルムドさんを　あんなふうに
　変えてしまったの……。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52417.ko:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 마물을…… 우릴 생각하는 마음이
　벨무드 씨를 그렇게
　바꿔 놓은 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52417.zh-Hans:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>他为怪物……
为我们着想的心意
将他变成了那个样子……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52417.zh-Hant:
<voice 00770_00052417><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>總是為怪物……為我們著想的心……
把貝爾穆德先生變成了那樣……<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52418.en:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Oh, that's right!
I called you here because there's
one more thing I needed to do!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52418.ja:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「あっ　そうだ！
　みんなを　呼びだしたのは
　もうひとつ　用事があったんだった！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52418.ko:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 참, 그렇지!
　<pc> 씨 일행을 부른 이유가
　하나 더 있었어!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52418.zh-Hans:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>啊，对了！
我把大家叫来，
还有一件事想说！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52418.zh-Hant:
<voice 00830_00052418><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>啊，對了！
我叫你出來
還有一件事！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52419.en:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>You said you were looking for
butterflies, right?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52419.ja:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。
　蝶を探してるって　言ってたよね？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52419.ko:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨.
　나비를 찾고 있다고 했지?<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52419.zh-Hans:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>。
你说过你在找蝴蝶吧？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52419.zh-Hant:
<voice 00860_00052419><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001><pc>，
你說你在找蝴蝶對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52420.en: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I was just thinking about this earlier.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52420.ja: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「これのことも　さっき　一緒に思いだしたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52420.ko: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 아까 이것도 같이 기억났거든.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52420.zh-Hans: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>这件事我刚刚也一并想起来了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52420.zh-Hant: <voice 01072_00052420><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我剛才也想起關於這個的事了。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52421.en:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>These bracelets have a butterfly shape
when they're put together...
<auto_br=2500>
I thought this might be one of
the butterflies you're looking for.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52421.ja:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「この腕輪ね　こうやって　ふたつ重ねると
　蝶に見えるの。あなたの探してた蝶って
　コレのことかも……と思って。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52421.ko:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 이 팔찌 말이야, 이렇게 2개를 겹치면
　나비 모양이 돼. <pc> 씨가 찾는
　나비가 이거 아닐까 싶어서…….<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52421.zh-Hans:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>这两个手镯，像这样凑在一起，
就能看到一只蝴蝶。我觉得……
你要找的蝴蝶可能就是这个。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52421.zh-Hant:
<voice 01200_00052421><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>手鐲只要像這樣把兩個疊在一起，
看起來就會像蝴蝶了。我想……
你在找的蝴蝶應該就是這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52422.en:
<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>These bracelets are precious to us, but...
This is the only thing we can give to
you to show our thanks!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52422.ja:
<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私たちの　大事なものだけど……
　コレくらいしか　お礼できるものがないから
　<pc>さんに　あげるねっ！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52422.ko:
<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 우리에게도 소중한 물건이지만……
　답례로 줄 만한 게 이것밖에 없으니
　<pc> 씨에게 줄게!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52422.zh-Hans:
<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>这东西对我们来说虽然很重要……
但是能当作谢礼的也只有这个了，
<pc>，给你吧！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52422.zh-Hant:
<voice 01240_00052422><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>雖然對我們來說很重要……
但我只有這個能夠回報給你，
所以就送給<pc>你了！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52423.ja:
<pc>は
パピヨンブレス（だいじなもの）を
受け取った！<me 60>
52423.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
蝴蝶手镯（重要物品）！<me 60>
52423.zh-Hant:
<pc>
收下了
蝴蝶手鐲（重要物品）！<me 60>

52424.en:
<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>I think I'll go on a journey with Kalevan.
I wanna get out there and see the world.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52424.ja:
<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「私は　これから　カレヴァンさんと一緒に
　旅に出ようかなって　思ってる。
　この世界を　じっくり見てみたいの。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52424.ko:
<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 난 이제부터 칼레반 씨와 함께
　여행을 떠날까 해.
　이 세계를 찬찬히 둘러보고 싶어.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52424.zh-Hans:
<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>我在想接下来要和加雷班一起去旅行，
好好看看这个世界。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52424.zh-Hant:
<voice 01490_00052424><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>接下來我打算
和加雷班先生一起去旅行。
我想好好看看這個世界。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52425.en:
<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Maybe then I can get some idea of how
Arahaghiro got into this mess...<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52425.ja:
<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「そうすれば　なぜ　アラハギーロが
　あんなことになったのか……
　何か　わかるかもしれないしね。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52425.ko:
<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그러면 왜 아라하길로가
　그렇게 변했는지……
　이유를 알 수 있을지도 모르니까.<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52425.zh-Hans:
<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那样的话，也许能明白
艾拉哈奇罗为什么……
会变成现在这样。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52425.zh-Hant:
<voice 01510_00052425><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>這樣我也許就能知道
為何艾拉哈奇羅會變成那樣……
也說不定。<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52426.en:
<voice 01550_00052426><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>Well, <pc>, until we meet again!
Thank you so, so much!!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52426.ja:
<voice 01550_00052426><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>「それじゃあ　<pc>さん
　また　どこかで会いましょ。
　ホントに　ホントに　ありがとう！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52426.ko:
<voice 01550_00052426><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>: 그럼, <pc> 씨
　다음에 또 만나자.
　정말, 정말 고마워!!<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52426.zh-Hans:
<voice 01550_00052426><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那么，<pc>，
再见了。
真的、真的很谢谢你！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52426.zh-Hant:
<voice 01550_00052426><start_lip_sync n02035 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>，
再見了。
真的真的很謝謝你！！<stop_lip_animation n02035 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52427.ja: <voice 01590_00052427><start_lip_sync m14103 _normal m00001>「ガルルッ♪<stop_lip_animation m14103 CLOSE_MOUTH>
